00020 
00021 __device void kernel_shader_evaluate(KernelGlobals *kg, uint4 *input, float4 *output, ShaderEvalType type, int i)
00022 {
00023     ShaderData sd;
00024     uint4 in = input[i];
00025     float3 out;
00026 
00027     if(type == SHADER_EVAL_DISPLACE) {
00028         /* setup shader data */
00029         int object = in.x;
00030         int prim = in.y;
00031         float u = __int_as_float(in.z);
00032         float v = __int_as_float(in.w);
00033 
00034         shader_setup_from_displace(kg, &sd, object, prim, u, v);
00035 
00036         /* evaluate */
00037         float3 P = sd.P;
00038         shader_eval_displacement(kg, &sd);
00039         out = sd.P - P;
00040     }
00041     else { // SHADER_EVAL_BACKGROUND
00042         /* setup ray */
00043         Ray ray;
00044         float u = __int_as_float(in.x);
00045         float v = __int_as_float(in.y);
00046 
00047         ray.P = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00048         ray.D = equirectangular_to_direction(u, v);
00049         ray.t = 0.0f;
00050 
00051 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00052         ray.dD.dx = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00053         ray.dD.dy = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00054         ray.dP.dx = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00055         ray.dP.dy = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00056 #endif
00057 
00058         /* setup shader data */
00059         shader_setup_from_background(kg, &sd, &ray);
00060 
00061         /* evaluate */
00062         int flag = 0; /* we can't know which type of BSDF this is for */
00063         out = shader_eval_background(kg, &sd, flag);
00064     }
00065     
00066     /* write output */
00067     output[i] = make_float4(out.x, out.y, out.z, 0.0f);
00068 }
00069 
00070 CCL_NAMESPACE_END
